projects.title: The Right Note
projects.category: Interactive site designed for users to discover more about their favorite artists and the lyrics from that artist.

projects.title: Brewtime App
projects.category: This full stack application explores making API calls using the Google places/maps API, and geolocation API once a user logs into the website. The user must though allow for location services and then they are provided the closest coffee shops in their location.

projects.title: Burger App
projects.category: In this app, the user will have the opportunity create a unique burger, eat the burger and then delete the burger from the webpage. The tech used in this app: MySQL, Node.js, Express, and handlebars.

projects.title: Exercise Tracker App
projects.category: In this app, the user can add their exercises on a daily basis. The tech used in this app: MongoDB, Node.js, Express.
